sections.summary: This proprietary OmniMetric indicator measures the 'GDP-per-hour-worked' enhancement attributed specifically to AI adoption. It is the 'Magic Sauce' that allows the economy to grow without overheating (inflation).
sections.deep_dive: Traditional economic models (Okun's Law, Phillips Curve) are breaking down because they assume linear productivity. AI introduces exponential productivity. We track code commit rates, legal document processing speeds, and automated customer service resolution times to calculate this multiplier.

sections.forecast_risks: The risk is 'Jevons Paradox'—efficiency leads to MORE consumption of resources (energy), driving inflation up via commodity channels, canceling out the deflationary benefit of cheap labor.
sections.gms_conclusion: The single most important metric for the 'New Normal'. High real rates are sustainable ONLY if this multiplier remains high. It is the justification for the entire 2026 bull market.
